类 PageRequest

    Serializable, Pageable

    public class PageRequest
extends AbstractPageRequest
    Basic Java Bean implementation of Pageable.

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PageRequest(int page, int size)
      已过时。 
      use of(int, int) instead.
      PageRequest(int page, int size, Sort.Direction direction, String... properties)
      已过时。 
      use #of(int, int, Direction, String...) instead.
      PageRequest(int page, int size, Sort sort)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use of(int, int, Sort) instead.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PageRequest

        @Deprecated
public PageRequest(int page,
                               int size)
        已过时。 use of(int, int) instead.
        Creates a new PageRequest. Pages are zero indexed, thus providing 0 for page will return the first page.
        参数:
        page - zero-based page index.
        size - the size of the page to be returned.

      • PageRequest

        @Deprecated
public PageRequest(int page,
                               int size,
                               Sort.Direction direction,
                               String... properties)
        已过时。 use #of(int, int, Direction, String...) instead.
        Creates a new PageRequest with sort parameters applied.
        参数:
        page - zero-based page index.
        size - the size of the page to be returned.
        direction - the direction of the Sort to be specified, can be null.
        properties - the properties to sort by, must not be null or empty.

      • PageRequest

        @Deprecated
public PageRequest(int page,
                               int size,
                               Sort sort)
        已过时。 since 2.0, use of(int, int, Sort) instead.
        Creates a new PageRequest with sort parameters applied.
        参数:
        page - zero-based page index.
        size - the size of the page to be returned.
        sort - can be null.

    • 方法详细资料

      • of

        public static PageRequest of(int page,
                             int size)
        Creates a new unsorted PageRequest.
        参数:
        page - zero-based page index.
        size - the size of the page to be returned.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • of

        public static PageRequest of(int page,
                             int size,
                             Sort sort)
        Creates a new PageRequest with sort parameters applied.
        参数:
        page - zero-based page index.
        size - the size of the page to be returned.
        sort - must not be null.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • of

        public static PageRequest of(int page,
                             int size,
                             Sort.Direction direction,
                             String... properties)
        Creates a new PageRequest with sort direction and properties applied.
        参数:
        page - zero-based page index.
        size - the size of the page to be returned.
        direction - must not be null.
        properties - must not be null.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0
